mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Through the activities developed and with the support of individuals, legal entities, public and private organizations, we aim to contribute to the well-being of vulnerable communities in our society within the geographical area of influence of our social work.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: To be the social welfare entity that provides the greatest attention to the vulnerable population in our region, awakening greater community participation in the execution of programs that ensure a better quality of life.
